content.question: A student drops a bag of mass <math alttext="lowercase m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> onto a cart of mass <math alttext="uppercase M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> that is sliding with speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> along a horizontal track with negligible friction. Immediately after the bag lands in the cart, the cart-bag system moves with speed <math alttext="v sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements correctly relates the two speeds and gives a correct reason for this relationship?

choices.label: <math alttext="v sub f is less than v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, because some of the cart-bag system’s mechanical energy is dissipated.

<math alttext="v sub f is less than v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the kinetic energy of the bag decreases.

<math alttext="v sub f is greater than v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the kinetic energy of the bag decreases.

<math alttext="v sub f is greater than v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the linear momentum of the bag is added to the linear momentum of the cart.

<math alttext="v sub f equals v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the bag is moving perpendicular to the cart.
